title: Emerald OS Watch Face
summary: A simple, beautiful, minimalistic watchface. Shows battery life at a glance.
description: Your smart watch is essentially a computer on your watch, rather than mimicking classical watches Emerald OS takes a different approach, it lets you enable your watch to look like something new, a watch operating system.This .minimalist watchface. combines the classic feel of desktop operating systems with a stylish twist to fit the small screen of smart watches. Optimised for round and square watches, with Emerald OS you get a watchface that suits your device, high tech, classic. Minimal and elegant.With the Emerald OS Watchface you can tell the time as well as your battery at a glance, also using Emerald Wear Power Saverâ„¢ Technology we have enabled you to maximize your battery life. Our software uses the tiniest possible amount of power by using the CPU as little and as efficiently as possible, this is done in various ways behind the scenes. You can expect significantly longer lasting battery when using our Emerald OS. Battery Saving Watchface.Try today, if you aren't satisfied you may return your watchface, however we guarantee you will be. This is a .minimalism watchface. which will give your smart watch the high tech feel you've been looking for.Android and Android wear run on an operating system called Linux. Emerald OS seeks to enable your watch to look like a tiny linux computer. With a touch of sophistication and a look of high-tech design you wont find in other watch faces.
descriptionHTML:
Your smart watch is essentially a computer on your watch, rather than mimicking classical watches Emerald OS takes a different approach, it lets you enable your watch to look like something new, a watch operating system.

This .minimalist watchface. combines the classic feel of desktop operating systems with a stylish twist to fit the small screen of smart watches. Optimised for round and square watches, with Emerald OS you get a watchface that suits your device, high tech, classic. Minimal and elegant.

With the Emerald OS Watchface you can tell the time as well as your battery at a glance, also using Emerald Wear Power Saver™ Technology we have enabled you to maximize your battery life. Our software uses the tiniest possible amount of power by using the CPU as little and as efficiently as possible, this is done in various ways behind the scenes. You can expect significantly longer lasting battery when using our Emerald OS. Battery Saving Watchface.

Try today, if you aren't satisfied you may return your watchface, however we guarantee you will be. This is a .minimalism watchface. which will give your smart watch the high tech feel you've been looking for.

Android and Android wear run on an operating system called Linux. Emerald OS seeks to enable your watch to look like a tiny linux computer. With a touch of sophistication and a look of high-tech design you wont find in other watch faces.
comments: Battery saver I don't ever comment but this app really helped with my battery life it made a huge difference I gave 4 stars because of 24 hour clock but other than that it was worth buying

Digging the simple and cheery colours a lot! Been using it all day and am so surprised at how much battery I have left with only one charge! I don't know how they did it but this has seriously made me love my watch even more, more than any other app I've downloaded because a big problem for me is how quickly the battery gets drained. I've been following Emerald Software for its past few releases and I must say that I am very impressed with the quality of the apps they produce. Big thanks to the team!
recentChanges: Fixed the battery position being incorrect on some devices
Improved battery saving algorithm even more
